channel.title: Owner Occupied on Loans101
channel.description: Recent content in Owner Occupied on Loans101

item.title: Macquarie Offset Home Loan
item.description: 1. Features [x] Offset Account [x] Redraw Facility [x] Allow Extra Repayment [x] Allow Loan Increase [x] Split Loans 2. Upfront Fees This is a fee that may be payable by the borrower to a lender prior to or at the application stage, of the lending process. An example of an upfront fee maybe an Application fee (while some may charge upfront, most do not), or Valuation fee (some lenders may charge, while others will cover this cost)
